resources.string:
Name : Rohan Singh 
											 Role : Android Developer 
					Contact us : rohansingh302623@gmail.com 

Rohan Singh is a dedicated Android Developer with a passion for creating impactful applications. Currently studying at FET Agra College in Btech 4th Year, Rohan's innovative spirit led him to develop the Naari Rakshak App, a mobile application designed to empower and protect women. With expertise in Android development, Rohan combines his technical skills with a deep understanding of user needs to create intuitive and effective solutions. His commitment to leveraging technology for social good drives his work, making him a valuable asset in the tech community. 

																							Thank you : Rohan Singh

How can I stay safe late at night? 
 1:	Safety in numbers. Always stay within a group when possible.
 2:	Arrange a lift or get taxis if you can.
 3:	Always book your taxi.
 4:	Drink in moderation and watch your drink.
 5:S	tay in well-lit areas.
 6:	Keep valuables hidden.
 7:	Keep away from hostile situations.

How can i safe alone at Home? 
 1:	Lock all doors and windows.
 2:	Turn on outdoor lights in the evening.
 3:	Keep blinds closed at night.
 4:	Retrieve mail during the day.
 5:	Check your peephole before opening the door for visitors.
 6:	Get your keys ready before approaching your door.
 7:	Carry pepper spray or an alarm.
Tips For Women on Staying safe!

string.name: All_Tips
string.b:
1:	Be Alert! Scan the area as you walk.
 2:	Avoid shopping alone.
 3:	Try to shop with a friend or relative.
 4:	Know your surroundings.
 5:	Carry your purse close to your body and do not leave 	 unattended.
 6:	Try not to carry too many packages.
